A certain number of them cross in the Corpus 
Callosum, a second lot run into the outer 
capsule & occupy its external half <s>border <\s>, while a third 
set curves downwards & enters the Island of Reil 
forming the “unnamed white substance”. All these 
fibres have a most interesting termination in 
relation to the bilateral function of this centre,
some of them crossing & others not doing so. <s>I cannot<\s>
It would be improper to diverge, however, from the subject of this 
communication at present to follow these out.
[The base of the brain & the  temporo-sphenoidal lobe 
in the region I am at present  describing do 
not I think contribute any callosal fibres.
The base is occupied by the grey matter of the 
<s>tubercinereum <\s> tuber cinereum and surrounding 
parts from wh: very few fibres of any description 
are derived, while the fibres of the temporo-sphenoidal
